client_profile: Couple moving to Brussels. Renting a 2+ room property with a budget of 2050-3600 EUR/month. Priorities include cafes, restaurants, parks, and central access.
must_have: Access to parks and green areas.
nice_to_have: Balcony or outdoor space for leisure.
Nearby cultural attractions for weekend activities.
red_flags: High noise levels in busy districts.
Limited parking options in central areas.
Potential for higher rents near EU quarter.
Traffic congestion during peak commute hours.
contradictions: Desire for central access may lead to noise.
Higher rent may conflict with budget limits.
Trendy areas may lack family-oriented features.

top_districts.name: City of Brussels
budget_reality: Rule of thumb: Average rent is high due to central location.
